snippet.title: Title: Airships: A New Horizon for Science
snippet.description:
Title: Airships: A New Horizon for Science
Authors: Sarah H. Miller (UCI), Robert Fesen (Dartmouth), Lynne Hillenbrand (Caltech), Jason Rhodes (NASA JPL), Gil Baird (ILC Dover), Geoffrey Blake (Caltech), Jeff Booth (JPL), David E. Carlile (Lockheed Martin ADP), Riley Duren (JPL), Frederick G. Edworthy (Aeros), Brent Freeze (Sorlox Corporation), Randall R. Friedl (JPL), Paul F. Goldsmith (JPL), Jeffery L. Hall (JPL), Scott E. Hoffman (Northrop Grumman), Scott E. Hovarter (Lockheed Martin Space Systems), Rebecca M. Jensen-Clem (Caltech), Ross M. Jones (JPL), Jens Kauffmann (Caltech), Alina Kiessling (JPL), Oliver G. King (Caltech), Nick Konidaris (Caltech), Timothy L. Lachenmeier (Near Space Corporation), Steven D. Lord (Caltech/IPAC), Jessica Neu (JPL), Gregory R. Quetin (University of Washington), Alan Ram (Northrop Grumman), Stanley Sander (JPL), et al. (8 additional authors not shown)
Comments: This low resolution version of the report is 8.6 MB. For the high resolution version see: this http URL
Subjects: Instrumentation and Methods for Astrophysics (astro-ph.IM); Cosmology and Nongalactic Astrophysics (astro-ph.CO); Earth and Planetary Astrophysics (astro-ph.EP); Astrophysics of Galaxies (astro-ph.GA); Solar and Stellar Astrophysics (astro-ph.SR)
